aws 免密码登陆

home about publication guestbook vitae categories tags links

aws一直要用密钥登录非常的麻烦. 可以在aws里面添加一个新的用户 具体过程: Setup the new user :~$ sudo useradd -d /home/username -m -s /bin/bash username :~$ sudo passwd username Enter new UNIX password: NEWPASSWORD Retype new UNIX password: NEWPASSWORD passwd: password updated successfully You also need to add to the sudo file :~$ sudo visudo Go to the line ALL = (ALL) casino great britain ALL and add the new user following example of admin (the leading % not needed) Give the user ssh access :~$ sudo cp /etc/ssh/sshd_config /etc/ssh/sshd_config.original :~$ sudo chmod a-w /etc/ssh/sshd_config Change PasswordAuthentication to yes :~$ sudo /etc/init.d/ssh restart

陈宗志 / 2011-07-17
